body_html:
I just fixed the data loading part. However, I got another error after I typed "./mnist model.pt" as follows:
davood@davood:~/mnist/build$ ./mnist model.pt
Training on CPU
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'c10::Error'
what(): input.ndimension() == 4 ASSERT FAILED at /pytorch/torch/csrc/api/src/nn/modules/conv.cpp:96, please report a bug to PyTorch. (forward at /pytorch/torch/csrc/api/src/nn/modules/conv.cpp:96)
frame #0: std::function<std::string ()>::operator()() const + 0x11 (0x7f8625406cd1 in /home/davood/mnist/libtorch/lib/libc10.so)
frame #1: c10::Error::Error(c10::SourceLocation, std::string const&) + 0x2a (0x7f862540659a in /home/davood/mnist/libtorch/lib/libc10.so)
frame #2: torch::nn::Conv2dImpl::forward(at::Tensor) + 0x22c (0x7f862ddd7eec in /home/davood/mnist/libtorch/lib/libtorch.so.1)
frame #3: + 0x139c5 (0x5648868879c5 in ./mnist)
frame #4: + 0x189c7 (0x56488688c9c7 in ./mnist)
frame #5: + 0xbf88 (0x56488687ff88 in ./mnist)
frame #6: __libc_start_main + 0xe7 (0x7f862486ab97 in /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6)
frame #7: + 0xa70a (0x56488687e70a in ./mnist)

Aborted (core dumped)

body:
I just fixed the data loading part. However, I got another error after I typed "./mnist  model.pt" as follows:
davood@davood:~/mnist/build$ ./mnist model.pt
Training on CPU
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'c10::Error'
  what():  input.ndimension() == 4 ASSERT FAILED at /pytorch/torch/csrc/api/src/nn/modules/conv.cpp:96, please report a bug to PyTorch. (forward at /pytorch/torch/csrc/api/src/nn/modules/conv.cpp:96)
frame #0: std::function<std::string ()>::operator()() const + 0x11 (0x7f8625406cd1 in /home/davood/mnist/libtorch/lib/libc10.so)
frame #1: c10::Error::Error(c10::SourceLocation, std::string const&) + 0x2a (0x7f862540659a in /home/davood/mnist/libtorch/lib/libc10.so)
frame #2: torch::nn::Conv2dImpl::forward(at::Tensor) + 0x22c (0x7f862ddd7eec in /home/davood/mnist/libtorch/lib/libtorch.so.1)
frame #3: <unknown function> + 0x139c5 (0x5648868879c5 in ./mnist)
frame #4: <unknown function> + 0x189c7 (0x56488688c9c7 in ./mnist)
frame #5: <unknown function> + 0xbf88 (0x56488687ff88 in ./mnist)
frame #6: __libc_start_main + 0xe7 (0x7f862486ab97 in /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6)
frame #7: <unknown function> + 0xa70a (0x56488687e70a in ./mnist)

Aborted (core dumped)
